hold_certain_amount_of_token_on_certain_.name: Hold certain amount of token on certain chain
hold_certain_amount_of_token_on_certain_.description: They hold on the Ethereum chain

hold_sum_usd_value_on_chain.name: Hold sum USD value on chain
hold_sum_usd_value_on_chain.description: They hold more than 1000 USD on Ethereum chain
hold_sum_usd_value_on_chain.query:
select wallet_address from (
        select wallet_address, argMaxMerge(balance) as balance, token_address, toFloat64(max(price_stable).2) as price
        from dex.balances_v010
        join dex.last_price_v02 on balances_v010.token_address = dex.last_price_v02.token_address
        where network = {{ network }} and wallet_address = 'replace'
        group by wallet_address, token_address
        having balance * price > {{ amount_usd }}
        )
